title: Multimedia Design Strategies for Strengthening Instructor Presence in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course focusing on designing instructor presence and multimedia elements in a blended learning environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design educational videos by applying Mayer’s Multimedia Learning Principles (concreteness, multimodality, segmentation, signaling).
Learners can implement 3+ communication strategies to enhance instructor presence in blended (online-offline) environments
Learners can optimize video content elements (graphics/text/speaker indicators) based on learner preference analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
